text: Thomas James Mitchell (29 July 1931 â€“ July 2020) was an Irish republican. He was active in the Irish Republican Army. While in jail he was twice elected as a Member of the United Kingdom Parliament, but was disqualified and his elections were not counted. Mitchell died in July 2020, shortly before his 89th birthday. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Irish politicians
title: Tom Mitchell (Irish politician)
